entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening and before morning. Wind southwest 20 km/h. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 6:42 PM EDT Sunday 19 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. A few flurries beginning in the afternoon. Local amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High zero.
